casebody.data:
Mario JUAREZ and Whitney Juarez, Individually; Whitney Juarez, as Parent and Natural Guardian of Marley Juarez, a Minor; and Whitney Juarez, as Parent and Natural Guardian of Landon Juarez, a Minor, Appellants/Cross-Appellees,
v.
Teri L. ST. HILAIRE as Personal Representative of the Estate of Norman G. Graf, Deceased; and Grow Financial Federal Credit Union, Appellees. RS & H, Inc., a Florida Corporation, as Successor in Interest to Reynolds, Smith, and Hills, a Florida Corporation, Appellee/Cross-Appellant. Case No. 2D18-557 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 14, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
